entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
